Class Mouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • Mouse
  • public class Mouse
extends Object
    This class represents the Mouse while monitoring and connecting it to method calls defined by the developer. It keeps track of mouse's position, previous position, button clicks (left, right, middle), as well as the scrolling/dragging. This class does not emulate proper encapsulation on purpose
